text: "Kiss the Dirt (Falling Down the Mountain)" is a 1986 song by INXS and taken from their fifth studio album Listen Like Thieves. It went to number 15 in Australia, number 42 in New Zealand and number 54 in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1986 songs Category:INXS songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Kiss the Dirt (Falling Down the Mountain)
